text:
A local pastor was arrested by the Anti-Corruption Bureau on Tuesday for allegedly accepting a bribe of Rs. 7 lakh for facilitating appointment of a youth as a teacher in a Godhra-based school run by the management of his church.

Simon Brainerd, a pastor attached to the Centenary Methodist Church in Fatehgunj area here, was caught on the premises of the church when he was allegedly accepting a bearer’s cheque of Rs. 7 lakh from the complainant, Ishwarbhai Pateliya.

Pastor Brainerd had allegedly sought the illegal gratification to facilitate appointment of Mr. Pateliya’s son Gerson as a teacher in the church-run high school. — PTI
title: Pastor seeks bribe, held with cheque for Rs. 7 lakh
